section.programlisting: 803 { 804 vec4 v1 = {-100.0f, -200.0f, -10.0f, -10.0f}; 805 vec4 v2 = {100.0f, 200.0f, 10.0f, 10.0f}; 806 vec4 v3; 807 808 GLM(vec4_lerpc)(v1, v2, 0.5f, v3); 809 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 0.0f)) 810 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 0.0f)) 811 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 0.0f)) 812 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 0.0f)) 813 814 GLM(vec4_lerpc)(v1, v2, 0.75f, v3); 815 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 50.0f)) 816 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 100.0f)) 817 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 5.0f)) 818 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 5.0f)) 819 820 GLM(vec4_lerpc)(v1, v2, -1.75f, v3); 821 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], -100.0f)) 822 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], -200.0f)) 823 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], -10.0f)) 824 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], -10.0f)) 825 826 GLM(vec4_lerpc)(v1, v2, 1.75f, v3); 827 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 100.0f)) 828 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 200.0f)) 829 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 10.0f)) 830 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 10.0f)) 831 832 TEST_SUCCESS 833 }

section.programlisting: 855 { 856 vec4 v1 = {-100.0f, -200.0f, -10.0f, -10.0f}; 857 vec4 v2 = {100.0f, 200.0f, 10.0f, 10.0f}; 858 vec4 v3; 859 860 GLM(vec4_mixc)(v1, v2, 0.5f, v3); 861 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 0.0f)) 862 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 0.0f)) 863 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 0.0f)) 864 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 0.0f)) 865 866 GLM(vec4_mixc)(v1, v2, 0.75f, v3); 867 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 50.0f)) 868 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 100.0f)) 869 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 5.0f)) 870 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 5.0f)) 871 872 GLM(vec4_mixc)(v1, v2, -1.75f, v3); 873 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], -100.0f)) 874 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], -200.0f)) 875 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], -10.0f)) 876 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], -10.0f)) 877 878 GLM(vec4_mixc)(v1, v2, 1.75f, v3); 879 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 100.0f)) 880 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 200.0f)) 881 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 10.0f)) 882 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 10.0f)) 883 884 TEST_SUCCESS 885 }

section.programlisting: 557 { 558 vec4 v1 = {2.0f, -3.0f, 4.0f, 60.0f}, 559 v2 = {-3.0f, 4.0f, -5.0f, 34.0f}, 560 v3, v4; 561 562 GLM(vec4_negate_to)(v1, v3); 563 GLM(vec4_negate_to)(v2, v4); 564 565 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[0], v3[0])) 566 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[1], v3[1])) 567 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[2], v3[2])) 568 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[3], v3[3])) 569 570 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[0], v4[0])) 571 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[1], v4[1])) 572 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[2], v4[2])) 573 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[3], v4[3])) 574 575 TEST_SUCCESS 576 }

section.programlisting: 940 { 941 vec4 v1 = {-100.0f, -200.0f, -10.0f, -10.0f}; 942 vec4 v2; 943 944 GLM(vec4_smoothstep_uni)(-200.0f, -100.0f, v1, v2); 945 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[0], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 946 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[1], 0.0f, 1e-5f)) 947 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[2], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 948 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[3], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 949 950 GLM(vec4_smoothstep_uni)(-250.0f, -200.0f, v1, v2); 951 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[0], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 952 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[1], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 953 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[2], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 954 ASSERT(test_eq_th(v2[3], 1.0f, 1e-5f)) 955 956 GLM(vec4_smoothstep_uni)(-200.0f, 200.0f, v1, v2); 957 ASSERT(v2[0] > 0.0f && v2[0] < 0.25f) 958 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 0.0f)) 959 ASSERT(v2[2] > 0.0f && v2[2] < 0.5f) 960 ASSERT(v2[3] > 0.0f && v2[3] < 0.5f) 961 962 TEST_SUCCESS 963 }
